hero.title: Storage service
hero.desc: We provide storage spaces equipped to receive all types of goods with careful follow-up to ensure they are maintained in the best condition

storageServicesDesc.title: Flexible and secure storage solutions for your goods
storageServicesDesc.desc: Our storage service offers a reliable space for your goods, whether for short or long-term needs. We ensure product quality with proper equipment and handle receiving, organizing, and accessing your items efficiently.

storageServicesFeatures.title: Discover why Femex is your top choice for storage services

desc.descOne: Equipped warehouses to keep goods in best condition
desc.descTwo: Regular monitoring and organization of stored contents
desc.descThree: Flexible storage places to suit different sizes and quantities

howItWorks.title: How does the storage service work?
howItWorks.desc: Simple steps to store and manage your goods effortlessly.

cardOne.heading: Receipt of goods
cardOne.desc: Initial preview and sorting before entering the warehouse

cardTwo.heading: Efficient recording and organization of storage.
cardTwo.desc: Place goods in the right place while creating a storage register

cardThree.heading: Periodic follow-up
cardThree.desc: Ensure the general condition and arrangement of contents when needed

cardFour.heading: Delivery upon request
cardFour.desc: Prepare the goods and deliver them to any point you specify

questionOne.question: Are there special equipment for some products?
questionOne.answer: Yes, depending on the type of goods appropriate conditions are provided

questionTwo.question: Is there a minimum storage amount?
questionTwo.answer: No, any quantity can be stored depending on the available space

questionThree.question: Is short-term storage possible?
questionThree.answer: Yes, the service includes short and long periods

questionFour.question: Can I visit the store?
questionFour.answer: A visit can be arranged upon request

questionFive.question: How is the storage cost calculated?
questionFive.answer: It is calculated according to the required area and period

readyStorageServices.title: Ready to start with us?
readyStorageServices.desc: Reserve your storage space now and enjoy secure and flexible solutions
